holidays.title: National Chocolate Candy Day
holidays.description: Face it. We love chocolate. And today we snack all we want!

holidays.title: National Download Day
holidays.description: Get your phone-fingers flexed, people. National Download Day is coming to town.

holidays.title: Card Playing Day
holidays.description: Shuffle your cards and cut the deck.

holidays.title: Holy Innocents Day
holidays.description: Honor the sacrifice of the Holy Innocents and celebrate the children in your life today.

holidays.title: National Short Film Day
holidays.description: The birth of the motion picture industry is celebrated on National Short Film Day.

holidays.title: National Tim Day
holidays.description: The name Tim, short for Timothy, is a classic name with a refined meaning.

holidays.title: Pledge of Allegiance Day
holidays.description: The Pledge of Allegiance was something we knew by heart and recited each morning in school.

holidays.title: Proclamation Day
holidays.description: Proclamation Day, celebrates the founding of the government in South Australia as a British province.

holidays.title: Big 30’s Birthday
holidays.description: The talented American rapper is winning over fans with his intriguing music.

holidays.title: Danny Edge’s Birthday
holidays.description: This YouTuber has a great sense of humor and is a talented musician.

holidays.title: David Archuleta’s Birthday
holidays.description: For some fans, his music is like therapy, for others, it is like a drug.

holidays.title: Denzel Washington’s Birthday
holidays.description: The actor, director, and producer is considered one of the greatest actors of all time.

holidays.title: Dolores Catania’s Birthday
holidays.description: This reality T.V. star is a living embodiment of a modern-day housewife and entrepreneur.

holidays.title: Emery Kelly’s Birthday
holidays.description: This pop star’s music has garnered the attention of people around the world for a reason.

holidays.title: Eric Griffin’s Birthday
holidays.description: This rock star’s music and style are as incredible as they are iconic.

holidays.title: Gayle King’s Birthday
holidays.description: The American television personality and journalist is one of the most influential celebrities in the country.

holidays.title: Joe Manganiello’s Birthday
holidays.description: He is known for his roles in “True Blood,” “Arrow,” and “How I Met Your Mother.”

holidays.title: John Legend’s Birthday
holidays.description: The multi-talented singer is winning awards and hearts with his music and activism.

holidays.title: London Goheen’s Birthday
holidays.description: This stunning Instagram star, model, and T.V. show host is a bonafide social media celebrity.

holidays.title: Maggie Smith’s Birthday
holidays.description: As one of the most prolific actresses, everybody knows her — Maggie Smith.

holidays.title: Malcolm Gets’s Birthday
holidays.description: This American actor is mostly known for his role in the sitcom “Caroline in the City.”

holidays.title: Maya Boyce’s Birthday
holidays.description: This young actress is a force to be reckoned with and blazes her own trail.

holidays.title: Nash Grier’s Birthday
holidays.description: The popular internet sensation has won over fans with his funny videos and acting skills.

holidays.title: Nichelle Nichols’s Birthday
holidays.description: Nichelle Nichols was one of those who sought equal representation — she was an icon.

holidays.title: Posie Rayne LaBrant’s Birthday
holidays.description: This little girl was a YouTube celebrity even before she was born!

holidays.title: Quackity’s Birthday
holidays.description: This expert YouTuber and lawyer in the making is a man of many talents.

holidays.title: Ratan Tata’s Birthday
holidays.description: He knows his stuff, and when the opportunity came to deliver, he gave his best!

holidays.title: Stan Lee’s Birthday
holidays.description: Let's look back and celebrate the mastermind behind Marvel’s most loved superheroes.

holidays.title: Woodrow Wilson’s Birthday
holidays.description: Meet the President of the United States who led the country through World War I.
